website_summaries.verdict: Designed to suit those packing for last-minute trips with space and durability not found in other brands.
pros: Made from durable 1680D ballistic nylon with EVA foam backing
Customers note the ability to travel with devices up to 15 in
Durable briefcase can hold up trip after trip
cons: Has only 2 wheels, which can make it difficult to transport

customer_reviews.title: Handle is flimsy | 17" laptop does not fit in small bag
customer_reviews.text: I have had the product for just under a month. I now rate it a 3 because of the handle, and the fact that the 17" laptop does not fit inside the bag meant for that size screen. The fabric is of expected good quality that I appreciate in a Samsonite merchandise. The video, showing the handle collapsing even after being locked in place, speaks for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Queen

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my work. It is well made and sturdy. No problems with wheels. The handle telescopes out easily. The front smaller zipper compartment has pockets for pens, cell phones and other smaller items. the second zippered compartment has two divided spaces. The third zippered compartment has 4 divided spaces I use to slide in my work folders. The fourth zippered compartment has two separate spaces. One is a padded space for a laptop. There is a black polyester insert with a handle that I can remove and carry the laptop separately. The other separate space has two meshed enclosures. I keep my laptop cords in there.
customer_reviews.author: valerie k

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this laptop bag
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this laptop bag. I was thrilled to find Samsonite was still making this model as I bought this to replace the same one that finally gave out after well over a decade of reliable use. I travel with TWO laptops and this bag holds that as well as many accessories. For my needs, this particular laptop bag is far superior to anything else I could find!
customer_reviews.author: J. Steele

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit for Dell Inspiron 7786 17.3
customer_reviews.text: It's a perfect fit for Dell Inspiron 7786 17.3 - 3 in 1 machine. Samsonite has made this for years. My wife has one that fails every six years or so - maybe because she packs 20 pounds of paperwork into it. I only wish they had a model just like this with 4 wheels. 4 is better than 2 when you are in a queue. Handling a 17 inch laptop (and lots else) is the real key here.
customer_reviews.author: TGC

customer_reviews.title: Good but not as good as my previous one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a similar one I've had for several years because the zipper broke. The quality is good just the same as the previous one. This new one is wider and does not fit down an airplane aisles. You have to carry it down the aisle. That to me is a negative. It also doesn't have as many separate zippered compartment as my previous one
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This suitcase works well for a 3 day work trip. I wish there was a little more room for clothes, and dress shoes. I like to workout while travel so it was a bit tight for my 3 day trip. All in all - great construction, several sections and kept my clothes from being wrinkled. I was able to bring this bag right off the plane to my meeting without it looking like a suitcase full of clothes.
customer_reviews.author: JLove

customer_reviews.title: Bad wheel design.  They didn’t last 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case in July and the plastic wheels are already cracked. I took it from my car to my office 5 days a week. Don’t buy this model with the plastic wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Sahmmy

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much I bought another!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the original version of this bag in 2006 and it has lasted through daily beatings. I bought the updated model this July, and after 2 months it still looks like new. The one thing I whish this model had is the handle with the extra padding. It was such a unique and wonderful feature that I would love to see it in future Samsonite bags. The great thing about this bag is for someone who is rarely in the office, all the essentials of my desk, including the emergency Band-Aids and Tylenol can fit, along with my laptop, files, binders, and there is still room for a purse and my lunch bag.
customer_reviews.author: PAK

customer_reviews.title: High quality bag at a mid range price.
customer_reviews.text: Used this bag for work. Packed it to the brim with electronics, equipment, office supplies, and even a change of clothes. It’s super sturdy; I was impressed with the zippers, wheels, and handle. I was able to put my 17 inch laptop in the second zipped compartment (where the file sections are) along with a tablet and a binder. It also fit inside the computer bag but I didn’t want to carry a separate thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: This is not what I received - instead I received a hard shelled American tourist. Because my son was moving out and the time constraints I was under, I decided to give it to him and am still without a briefcase
customer_reviews.author: nickeloldie

customer_reviews.title: Broke 7 days after return window
customer_reviews.text: Only 30 days for a return. Handle for pulling this broke at exactly 37 days. Don’t recommend for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this bag. It looks very professional ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this bag. It looks very professional and has plenty of room for all his documents including his personal computer. So far we haven't experienced any trouble with the wheels as others reviewers have posted (we bought it a couple of months ago). Will update this review if something happens.
customer_reviews.author: Moya

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise good bag, but does not meet my primary need
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to find an airplane where this can roll down the aisle. What happened to sizing these for airplane travel? Otherwise good bag, but does not meet my primary need.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLover

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and appears to be well built
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and appears to be well built . I would recommend it to anyone needing this type of bag .
customer_reviews.author: Donald Terry

customer_reviews.title: Nice, roomy case
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so I could pack up a day's worth of tasks and work from a remote location. It fits the job just fine. I can tote my laptop, files, supplies, even a large 3 ring binder. The handle is a little flimsy. I would have preferred a removable strap on the large compartment that would keep the case from laying flat when open. In all, happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lv2Read

customer_reviews.title: I had a similar Samsonite overnight bag for laptop and ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar Samsonite overnight bag for laptop and one side for clothes. This one is not as well made. zipper keeps getting stuck on two different parts of the bag. handle does not stay up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CPAP luggage case.
customer_reviews.text: Used to carry 2 Cpaps when traveling. Works great. Design wasn't as good as old Samsunite case but, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: James Wohlford

customer_reviews.title: This is still one of the best designs for the hearty traveler. A proven warrior!
customer_reviews.text: I travel, and travel a lot! I've tried other bags, but in the end I've come back to the Samsonite 11021 for a 3rd time. the back pocket hold a full size laptop and an additional screen, the center storage a briefcase full of cables, connectors and miscellaneous equipment. Though it's defiantly not an under the set bag, it's fantastic for the traveling presenter.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Grundy

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Handle.  Poorly constructed.
customer_reviews.text: Posted a video. Very flimsy handle. For the Samsonite brand this seems poorly made. I can’t imagine it being strong enough for files and a computer or books. I bought it for law school but I will return and get Swiss Gear instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room but a little rickety.
customer_reviews.text: The product has los of room for all the things I carry and can fit in most overhead bins fully loaded. The wheels only last about a year and the handle when extended is a little rickety. The last on I had the strap handle broke after a year.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Castiglioni

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for transporting my sales folders, computer, cords, etc. A lot of value for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor product.
customer_reviews.text: Poor product.!! constantly falls forward doesn't stand alone, worse when the retractable handle is extended. Pocket design also poor inconvenient to use. I've had many similar Samsonite bags that were far better than this model. Don't buy
customer_reviews.author: ajma

customer_reviews.title: Travels Well
customer_reviews.text: Best small bag on wheels that I've used. Perfect for short trips. Travels well.
customer_reviews.author: Marc M.

customer_reviews.title: What is the warranty?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a replacement for my older Samsonite mobile. It does not seem to be of the same quality; at least as far as the telescoping handle is concerned. What is the warranty on this product?
customer_reviews.author: Praetorian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for business
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, a little bit heavy and bulky but excellent for carrying everything around.
customer_reviews.author: K.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bag, not huge money, with room to spare. A very nice purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Three larger compartments are perfect for transporting lots of paper and technology. Keep in mind it's big, but if what you're looking for is something to carry a number of files and your technology, this is the ticket.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Gearhart

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag. My husband carries two laptops in it. He had used a Swiss one previously, and likes this one even more.
customer_reviews.author: MAK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I drive a truck this bag is good for gear in and out of the rig
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag came as described. It fits two 17 inch laptops. I love the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second identical Samsonite Business One Mobile Office bag I've purchased. The first lasted 5 years, a real work horse and I beat it to death. Looked all over for the same bag and now I'm happy to have it. It fits my needs perfectly. Very sturdy, except for the zippers, which nearly all broke, but I abused them!
customer_reviews.author: book lover

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: Met expectations I use to carry material to and from University where I teach on public transportation . Telescoping handle could be more robust and the same for the wheels larger and heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Kubic

customer_reviews.title: Best rolling computer bag !
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Just the perfect size to fit my 17” laptop. Lots of space & pockets to keep everything separated & organized.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Ricketts

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The metal handle doesn't lock up when pull it all way up. It consistently goes down.
customer_reviews.author: Old Fencer

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: fast shipping. The handle wiggles a bit and I can't see anyway to tighten it. Perhaps it's to prevent it from breaking on sudden jolts. Otherwise, it seems very sturdy. There are so many zippers it's easy to forget where you put things. I frequently fly Southwest Airlines and I confirmed that it fits under the seat. The aisle seat it much tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 6 months. One zipper broke off. The rest is ok I guess, not top quality but good value afterall
customer_reviews.author: DEAR Buckland

customer_reviews.title: Great computer bag!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 17" laptop. Roomy with numerous compartment for organizing materials and supplies. Would definetly recommend as a professional work bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jalisa

customer_reviews.title: Another great choice from Samsonite
customer_reviews.text: In love with this bag. I was looking for the ideal business bag - I guess I found it. Very functional, great space for all sort of things.
customer_reviews.author: Cedric Jacob

customer_reviews.title: perfect for huge laptop
customer_reviews.text: I have a huge laptop computer for work, makes transportation easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Office on wheel!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. Works perfectly for me and it easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Merlon Devine

customer_reviews.title: Great product perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Perfect size for our field reps. Holds their laptop, printer, and scanner plus a number of other accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Griggs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Roller
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy product. I purchased this in 2006 and have been consistently using it when I need to take more than just my laptop. It rolls nice, has plenty of space, expands a bit as well.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Smart looking. intelligent design
customer_reviews.text: Durable. Smart looking. intelligent design. Plenty of storage space. Be nice if it was TSA compliant so that you don't have to remove computer.
customer_reviews.author: jeff Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for short trips
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this unit I do a lot of one to two day trips it is perfect for this kind of use
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Missing a piece
customer_reviews.text: I like the case but it is described as having a removable computer sleeve. Mine did not have the sleeve
customer_reviews.author: Lauren W Laabs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product, used it about a dozen times & does what I wanted. Wheels work great, plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: M & M

customer_reviews.title: good product so far
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how durable this product is yet because I have not used it for long. The previous Samsonite overnighter (similar) was very durable and lasted me for 7 yrs before zippers gave out from constant over packing and use. 17" laptop will not fit in removable sleeve but will fit in the pocket for the sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: CRM

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really like it. Sturdy and can pack a weeks worth of clothing
customer_reviews.author: Chin Ma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: These are well made bags with really good zippers so if durability is your #1 need, go for it.. As it ended up I did 4 stars and returned it as this model just did not have the internal layout that I needed/wanted. My old Samsonite (basically the same case) that traveled for 10+ years has several extra horizontal zipper sections at the tops of compartments which really helped to keep things flatter. This new one did not have them.
customer_reviews.author: Daine P

customer_reviews.title: This bag is an embarrassment to Samsonite
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case to replace my current Samsonite mobile office (purchased at CostCo one year ago). My current one is very well made but the retractable handle is failing. This new unit is so poorly made I'm embarrass for the Samsonite brand. This new unit wouldn't withstand a single flight as a checked bag. I repackaged the unit for return right after I opened it..... come on Samsonite, we deserve better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hakala

customer_reviews.title: sleeve too small
customer_reviews.text: very nice bag, holds a lot of items other than the lap top. It truly is a mobile office. But, the darn portable bag inside of the mobile office is way too small, its useless. I called Samonite 3x and each time was told to call another number. I got tired of the run around! I don't know what it is supposed to fit, but it does not fit a HP 15.4" laptop. I don't think it will fit a 12" laptop either. Oh well, so much for samsonite. I still have the Mobile Office and the portable bag that is way too small.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Heigle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! It was a gift the recipient was thrilled with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good room, okay quality except handle which is below average.
customer_reviews.text: I have used it once and it hand latch ( handle) lock has stopped working. Room for clothes for overnight(1-2) events is there. Very good compartment capacity with easy 17 inches laptop holding pocket. Easy to put in air cabin in mid size aircraft but had to put below seat on small ones. It’s is handle quality can be a deal breaker. I would like to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: jarman

customer_reviews.title: Fits in the overhead of small commercial airliners
customer_reviews.text: This bag is my GO TO for caring my computer needs. I have been ordering this exact bag for almost twenty years. It is one of few bags that fit in the overhead in the smallest commercial aircraft. I fly over 150,000 miles a year and it goes on all my trips.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Richman

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, so far
customer_reviews.text: I'm torn; I LOVE this bag (already had one), but am starting to have issues with one of the zippers sticking in a few spots. It is still a great bag for travel and fits nicely under the seat in most airplanes. Rolls well and fits a lot of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: AtlSw

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you, this is a real steal and a great product--I love it and shopping this way is so convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Levenson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk, I returned it as it was not ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap junk, I returned it as it was not worth half of the price charged.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bag for me. I like this size and color of this bag. I will use this bag on my business every day. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Hakusyu

customer_reviews.title: Great mobile office!
customer_reviews.text: Great little bag! Perfect for my work travels and it even has room for some over night items. Sturdy construction. Wheels, handles and zippers are of good quality. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This bag exceeds my expectations! I am now organized and always ready for travel on a short notice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The receiver of this gift couldn't say enough good things about this laptop PC mobile office.
customer_reviews.author: GW

product_meta.title: Samsonite Business One Mobile Office, Black, 14 x 9 x 17.5-Inch
product_meta.description:
Size:18"| Color:BlackNotebook case is made of ballistic nylon fabric with EVA foam backing. Design features a separate compartment for business and personal belongings, padded honeycomb frame laptop compartment, fully lined interior, and gusseted pockets. Carry with zip-away retractable handle or comfortable padded handles. Notebook case rolls on shock-absorbing softspin wheels.

AMAZON.COM
Samsonite's rugged and attractive Business One mobile office boasts durable 1680 Denier Ballistic Nylon fabric with EVA foam backing and roomy compartments for your computer and other personal effects. The case's 1680D ballistic nylon is a standard, even weave of durable nylon originally specified by the Federal Government for military use. The term "denier" (D) refers to the size of the yarn used: the larger the denier, the bigger the yarn.

 The case's SoftSpin wheels travel more quietly than traditional inline skate wheels and reduce shocks by absorbing vibrations. Its push-button retractable handle locks when fully extended so you can push or pull the case, and the handle also locks when fully recessed, reducing the risk of damage when it's not in use.

 Stash your laptop in a padded compartment specifically designed to carry and protect it while you're traveling. Last but certainly not least, a handy organizer pocket offers areas to store writing instruments, cellular phones, PDAs, and other accessories.

 The case measures 17.5 x 14 x 9 inches (W x H x D).
feature_bullets: Notebook case is made of ballistic nylon fabric with EVA foam backing
Design features a separate compartment for bUsiness and personal belongings, padded honeycomb frame laptop compartment, fully lined interior, and gUsseted pockets
Carry with zip-away retractable handle or comfortable padded handles. Inline skate wheels, Retractable handle

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars117 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
